title: Best of the Program | Guests: Mark Levin & Amos Miller | 8/24/22
description:
Glenn and Stu go over some good news around the country, including the big wins conservatives had in Florida school districts. BlazeTV host of "LevinTV" Mark Levin joins Glenn to explain how the Espionage Act works. Pennsylvania Amish farmer Amos Miller joins to share how his farm is under attack by the FDA for refusing to abide by federal safety standards.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
